item.title: Illegal flags attached to street furniture, 14th October
item.description:
The flags have been in place for months and still not removed. Not only are they illegally placed on street furniture, they are known to be making a political statement. They should be removed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Need for yellow boxes, 14th October
item.description:
The roundabout nr GCHQ desperately needs yellow boxes to stop the lanes getting clogged up. When busy, this roundabout becomes dangerous where you have cars from all angles trying to use the roundabout & often narrowly crossing paths, enraging drivers. It gets to a point all roads surrounding the roundabout are at a standstill. Please put yellow boxes on the section heading towards Cheltenham so traffic taking the second exit can flow
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arle Court Roundabout, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 14th October
item.description:
ROAD CLOSURE 28 DAY PLEASE REFRESH STOP MARKINGS APPROXIMATELY 7 METERS LINE PLUS X 2 3 METER LINES (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large rocks placed on public pavement outside 47 Sandyleaze, 14th October
item.description:
Large rocks have been placed on the public pavement outside 47 Sandyleaze, Gloucester GL2 0PX. They obstruct pedestrian access and pose a significant risk to vehicles manoeuvring nearby. My own car has already sustained damage as a result of this obstruction. The rocks are not on private property and are within the public highway boundary.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandyleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Sign on over hang of bridge, 14th October
item.description:
It’s on the bridge crossing. Falling off danger to life if it falls through car window screen! I’m sure it’s where the bridge has been hit so many times. It’s become loose. Please stand on bishops cleanse side and look up at the bridge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign bracket is hanging/fallen off (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Roadworks left causing obstruction despite minor repair being carried out over a week ago, 14th October
item.description:
Down Hatherley lane between b4063 and Safran car park. Absolute disgrace all the road works carried out with no work being done and the effect on traffic flow as well as safety
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Down Hatherley Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lane markings, 14th October
item.description:
From C&G roundabout to Zoons Court roundabout, there is no white markings OR amber studs by the central reservation on the overtaking lane. As a driver in the dark, I cannot see the edge of the bank and this makes that particular part of the road VERY dangerous. This morning I slightly drove into the bank of the central reservation, because I couldn’t see the difference between the road / carriageway and the bank!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
